name: A Druid's End
description:
A Druid's End

This is game about a druid who wants to take root in the last moments of his life. For this purpose, he needs to meditate and concentrate to become one with the forest. However, while meditating, demons of the forest will try to attack the druid, so the forest helps him to complete the ritual. This game is a tower defense in which you control the forest roots with your mouse to help the druid in his mission.

This game was made for the GlobalGameJam 2023.
